name: CharacterSheetCreate
description:
By setting the following calculation formula, it is possible to automatically generate parameters automatically.

◆ Random dice
Example) 1D 6: 6 face dice 1 piece (die type: 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20, 100)
◆ addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of two parameters
Example) Status A + Status B
◆ Addition of constant

When combined, you can also:
3D 6 + (Status A + Status B) * 2 + 6
